item.description:
"Through interviews with fans, including George Lucas, J.J. Abrams, Seth MacFarlane, and many notable Star Trek alums, Trek Nation chronicles a son's journey to discover his father's work that helped define science fiction."

It "is an enlightening documentary that details Rod's trek across America to discover his father through the touchstones Gene left behind: his friends, his work, and his influence. [The film features] surprising, revelatory conversations with Star Trek actors, fans, family friends, and some of entertainment's most iconic figures."

This Meetup is listed Western MA Movie Meetup, Dr. Who Club of Western MA, Western MA Sci-Fi Meetup and Pioneer Valley Geeks, so whoever comes can form a group together and we'll have more fun. I am anticipating at least 10 people total.

We are having an Eatup B4 Meetup which you can RSVP for separately if interested. The film is at Hampshire College, Amherst, MA. We'll gather in the lobby of Franklin Patterson Hall at 6:30pm or so. The film starts at 7pm. It is free and open to the public, and followed by a talkback with Rod Roddenberry. Below is a map of Hampshire College campus. The red line shows the path from the Main Entrance (West St.) to Franklin Patterson Hall.
item.name: Trek Nation + Rod Roddenberry
